import React from 'react'; import { Form, Input, Button, DatePicker, Select, Table } from 'antd'; import { EditOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import StatusCard from '../components/StatusCard'; const { Option } = Select; export default function ProfilePage() { const userInfo = { name: 'Malith Bandara', email: 'malithb072@gmail.com', gender: 'Male', birthdate: '2002-07-02', role: 'Software Engineer', location: 'Ratnapura, Sri Lanka', }; const columns = [ { title: 'Field', dataIndex: 'field', key: 'field', }, { title: 'Value', dataIndex: 'value', key: 'value', }, ]; const data = Object.entries(userInfo).map(([key, value], index) => ({ key: index, field: key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1), value, })); return ( <> {/* Top Metrics */}
